verses.kjv: In the first year of Belshazzar king of Babylon Daniel had a dream and visions of his head upon his bed: then he wrote the dream, and told the sum of the matters.
verses.web: In the first year of Belshazzar king of Babylon Daniel had a dream and visions of his head on his bed. Then he wrote the dream and told the sum of the matters.
verses.ct: During the 1st year of King Belshazzar's reign over Babylon, Daniel had a dream filled with visions as he lay in bed. He wrote down the dream and summarized what he saw.

verses.kjv: Daniel spake and said, I saw in my vision by night, and, behold, the four winds of the heaven strove upon the great sea.
verses.web: Daniel spoke and said, “I saw in my vision by night, and, behold, the four winds of the sky broke out on the great sea.
verses.ct: Daniel said, "In my vision that night, I saw the 4 winds of heaven churning up the great sea.

verses.kjv: And four great beasts came up from the sea, diverse one from another.
verses.web: Four great animals came up from the sea, different from one another.
verses.ct: Then 4 enormous beasts rose out of the sea, each one different from the others.

verses.kjv: The first was like a lion, and had eagle’s wings: I beheld till the wings thereof were plucked, and it was lifted up from the earth, and made stand upon the feet as a man, and a man’s heart was given to it.
verses.web: “The first was like a lion, and had eagle’s wings. I watched until its wings were plucked, and it was lifted up from the earth, and made to stand on two feet as a man. A man’s heart was given to it.
verses.ct: "The first looked like a lion with eagle's wings. As I watched, its wings were torn off. Then it was lifted up from the ground and made to stand on 2 feet like a human, and it was given a human heart.

verses.kjv: And behold another beast, a second, like to a bear, and it raised up itself on one side, and it had three ribs in the mouth of it between the teeth of it: and they said thus unto it, Arise, devour much flesh.
verses.web: “Behold, there was another animal, a second, like a bear. It was raised up on one side, and three ribs were in its mouth between its teeth. They said this to it: ‘Arise! Devour much flesh!’
verses.ct: "Then a second beast appeared, one that looked like a bear. It was raised up on one side, with 3 ribs clenched between its teeth. A voice commanded it, 'Get up! Gorge yourself on flesh!'

verses.kjv: After this I beheld, and lo another, like a leopard, which had upon the back of it four wings of a fowl; the beast had also four heads; and dominion was given to it.
verses.web: “After this I saw, and behold, another, like a leopard, which had on its back four wings of a bird. The animal also had four heads; and dominion was given to it.
verses.ct: "After that, I saw a third beast that looked like a leopard. It had 4 bird's wings on its back and 4 heads, and it was given authority to rule.

verses.kjv: After this I saw in the night visions, and behold a fourth beast, dreadful and terrible, and strong exceedingly; and it had great iron teeth: it devoured and brake in pieces, and stamped the residue with the feet of it: and it was diverse from all the beasts that were before it; and it had ten horns.
verses.web: “After this I saw in the night visions, and, behold, there was a fourth animal, awesome and powerful, and exceedingly strong. It had great iron teeth. It devoured and broke in pieces, and stamped the residue with its feet. It was different from all the animals that were before it. It had ten horns.
verses.ct: "After that, in my night visions, I saw a 4th beast — terrifying, dreadful, and incredibly powerful. It had massive iron teeth that crushed and devoured everything, then trampled whatever was left under its feet. It was completely unlike the beasts before it, and it had 10 horns.

verses.kjv: I considered the horns, and, behold, there came up among them another little horn, before whom there were three of the first horns plucked up by the roots: and, behold, in this horn were eyes like the eyes of man, and a mouth speaking great things.
verses.web: “I considered the horns, and behold, there came up among them another horn, a little one, before which three of the first horns were plucked up by the roots: and behold, in this horn were eyes like the eyes of a man, and a mouth speaking great things.
verses.ct: "While I was studying the horns, another horn — a small one — pushed up among them, ripping 3 of the original horns out by the roots. This little horn had eyes like a human and a mouth that spoke arrogant, boastful words.

verses.kjv: I beheld till the thrones were cast down, and the Ancient of days did sit, whose garment was white as snow, and the hair of his head like the pure wool: his throne was like the fiery flame, and his wheels as burning fire.
verses.web: “I watched until thrones were placed, and one who was ancient of days sat. His clothing was white as snow, and the hair of his head like pure wool. His throne was fiery flames, and its wheels burning fire.
verses.ct: "I kept watching until thrones were set in place, and the Ancient of Days took his seat. His clothing was white as snow, and the hair on his head was like pure wool. His throne blazed with flames of fire, and its wheels burned with fire.

verses.kjv: A fiery stream issued and came forth from before him: thousand thousands ministered unto him, and ten thousand times ten thousand stood before him: the judgment was set, and the books were opened.
verses.web: A fiery stream issued and came out from before him. Thousands of thousands ministered to him. Ten thousand times ten thousand stood before him. The judgment was set. The books were opened.
verses.ct: A river of fire poured out from before him. Thousands upon thousands served him, and millions upon millions stood in his presence. The court was seated, and the books were opened.

verses.kjv: I beheld then because of the voice of the great words which the horn spake: I beheld even till the beast was slain, and his body destroyed, and given to the burning flame.
verses.web: “I watched at that time because of the voice of the great words which the horn spoke. I watched even until the animal was slain, and its body destroyed, and it was given to be burned with fire.
verses.ct: "I kept watching because of the arrogant words the little horn was speaking. I watched until the 4th beast was killed, its body destroyed and thrown into the blazing fire.

verses.kjv: As concerning the rest of the beasts, they had their dominion taken away: yet their lives were prolonged for a season and time.
verses.web: As for the rest of the animals, their dominion was taken away; yet their lives were prolonged for a season and a time.
verses.ct: "The other beasts had their authority stripped away, but they were allowed to go on living for a limited time.

verses.kjv: I saw in the night visions, and, behold, one like the Son of man came with the clouds of heaven, and came to the Ancient of days, and they brought him near before him.
verses.web: “I saw in the night visions, and behold, there came with the clouds of the sky one like a son of man, and he came even to the ancient of days, and they brought him near before him.
verses.ct: "In my night visions, I saw someone like a Son of man coming with the clouds of heaven. He approached the Ancient of Days, and they brought him into his presence.

verses.kjv: And there was given him dominion, and glory, and a kingdom, that all people, nations, and languages, should serve him: his dominion is an everlasting dominion, which shall not pass away, and his kingdom that which shall not be destroyed.
verses.web: Dominion was given him, and glory, and a kingdom, that all the peoples, nations, and languages should serve him. His dominion is an everlasting dominion, which will not pass away, and his kingdom that which will not be destroyed.
verses.ct: He was given dominion, glory, and a kingdom so that people of every nation and language would serve him. His dominion is an everlasting dominion that will never fade, and his kingdom will never be destroyed.

verses.kjv: I Daniel was grieved in my spirit in the midst of my body, and the visions of my head troubled me.
verses.web: “As for me, Daniel, my spirit was grieved within my body, and the visions of my head troubled me.
verses.ct: "As for me, Daniel, my spirit was deeply troubled, and the visions racing through my mind terrified me.

verses.kjv: I came near unto one of them that stood by, and asked him the truth of all this. So he told me, and made me know the interpretation of the things.
verses.web: I came near to one of those who stood by, and asked him the truth concerning all this. “So he told me, and made me know the interpretation of the things.
verses.ct: I approached one of those standing nearby and asked him what all of this meant. So he explained it to me and gave me the interpretation.

verses.kjv: These great beasts, which are four, are four kings, which shall arise out of the earth.
verses.web: ‘These great animals, which are four, are four kings, who will arise out of the earth.
verses.ct: "He said, 'These 4 great beasts represent 4 kings who will rise to power on the earth.

verses.kjv: But the saints of the most High shall take the kingdom, and possess the kingdom for ever, even for ever and ever.
verses.web: But the saints of the Most High will receive the kingdom, and possess the kingdom forever, even forever and ever.’
verses.ct: But the saints of the Most High will receive the kingdom and will possess it forever — yes, forever and ever.'

verses.kjv: Then I would know the truth of the fourth beast, which was diverse from all the others, exceeding dreadful, whose teeth were of iron, and his nails of brass; which devoured, brake in pieces, and stamped the residue with his feet;
verses.web: “Then I desired to know the truth concerning the fourth animal, which was different from all of them, exceedingly terrible, whose teeth were of iron, and its nails of bronze; which devoured, broke in pieces, and stamped the residue with its feet;
verses.ct: "Then I wanted to understand the truth about the 4th beast, the one so different from all the others — utterly terrifying, with iron teeth and bronze claws, devouring and crushing everything, then trampling the remains under its feet.

verses.kjv: And of the ten horns that were in his head, and of the other which came up, and before whom three fell; even of that horn that had eyes, and a mouth that spake very great things, whose look was more stout than his fellows.
verses.web: and concerning the ten horns that were on its head, and the other horn which came up, and before which three fell, even that horn that had eyes, and a mouth that spoke great things, whose look was more stout than its fellows.
verses.ct: I also wanted to know about the 10 horns on its head, and about the other horn that came up and knocked 3 of them down — the horn with human eyes and a mouth that spoke boastful words, the one that looked more imposing than the others.

verses.kjv: I beheld, and the same horn made war with the saints, and prevailed against them;
verses.web: I saw, and the same horn made war with the saints, and prevailed against them,
verses.ct: As I watched, that same horn waged war against the saints and was overpowering them,

verses.kjv: Until the Ancient of days came, and judgment was given to the saints of the most High; and the time came that the saints possessed the kingdom.
verses.web: until the ancient of days came, and judgment was given to the saints of the Most High, and the time came that the saints possessed the kingdom.
verses.ct: until the Ancient of Days arrived and pronounced judgment in favor of the saints of the Most High. Then the time came for the saints to take possession of the kingdom.

verses.kjv: Thus he said, The fourth beast shall be the fourth kingdom upon earth, which shall be diverse from all kingdoms, and shall devour the whole earth, and shall tread it down, and break it in pieces.
verses.web: “Thus he said, ‘The fourth animal will be a fourth kingdom on earth, which will be different from all the kingdoms, and will devour the whole earth, and will tread it down, and break it in pieces.
verses.ct: "He explained it this way: 'The 4th beast is a 4th kingdom that will appear on earth. It will be unlike any kingdom before it. It will devour the whole earth, trampling it and crushing it to pieces.

verses.kjv: And the ten horns out of this kingdom are ten kings that shall arise: and another shall rise after them; and he shall be diverse from the first, and he shall subdue three kings.
verses.web: As for the ten horns, ten kings will arise out of this kingdom. Another will arise after them; and he will be different from the former, and he will put down three kings.
verses.ct: The 10 horns are 10 kings who will rise from this kingdom. After them, another king will arise, different from the earlier ones, and he will overthrow 3 kings.

verses.kjv: And he shall speak great words against the most High, and shall wear out the saints of the most High, and think to change times and laws: and they shall be given into his hand until a time and times and the dividing of time.
verses.web: He will speak words against the Most High, and will wear out the saints of the Most High. He will plan to change the times and the law; and they will be given into his hand until a time and times and half a time.
verses.ct: He will speak against the Most High and wear down the saints of the Most High. He will try to change the established times and laws, and the saints will be handed over to him for a time, times, and half a time.

verses.kjv: But the judgment shall sit, and they shall take away his dominion, to consume and to destroy it unto the end.
verses.web: “ ‘But the judgment will be set, and they will take away his dominion, to consume and to destroy it to the end.
verses.ct: "'But then the court will sit in judgment, and his dominion will be stripped away — completely consumed and destroyed forever.

verses.kjv: And the kingdom and dominion, and the greatness of the kingdom under the whole heaven, shall be given to the people of the saints of the most High, whose kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and all dominions shall serve and obey him.
verses.web: The kingdom and the dominion, and the greatness of the kingdoms under the whole sky, will be given to the people of the saints of the Most High. His kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and all dominions will serve and obey him.’
verses.ct: Then the kingdom, the dominion, and the greatness of all the kingdoms under heaven will be handed over to the people who are the saints of the Most High. His kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and every ruler will serve and obey him.'

verses.kjv: Hitherto is the end of the matter. As for me Daniel, my cogitations much troubled me, and my countenance changed in me: but I kept the matter in my heart.
verses.web: “Here is the end of the matter. As for me, Daniel, my thoughts much troubled me, and my face was changed in me; but I kept the matter in my heart.”
verses.ct: "That was the end of the vision. As for me, Daniel, my thoughts deeply troubled me, and my face went pale. But I kept everything to myself.
